abstract: The sharp rise in money market rates threatened to recreate the liquidity crunch that rattled markets in June.
snippet: The sharp rise in money market rates threatened to recreate the liquidity crunch that rattled markets in June.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI — China’s money market rates rose sharply on Thursday, increasing short-term borrowing costs and threatening to recreate the liquidity squeeze that rattled markets in June.

headline.main: Central Bank in China Acts to Ease Rate Jumps
headline.print_headline: Central Bank In China Acts to Ease Rate Jumps
